com.guardtime.envelope.signature.postponed

Class PostponedSignatureFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.guardtime.envelope.signature.postponed.PostponedSignatureFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SignatureFactory

    public class PostponedSignatureFactory
extends Object
implements SignatureFactory
    Implementation for a SignatureFactory that allows postponing of the real signing.

    Requires actual SignatureFactory for providing proper signatures once they are available.

    For creating placeholder EnvelopeSignatures a SignatureFactoryType or SignatureFactory must be provided to indicate what type of signatures will eventually be used.

      • sign

        public void sign(SignatureContent signatureContent)
          throws SignatureException
        Replaces placeholder underlying signature in EnvelopeSignature for provided signatureContent.
        Parameters:
        signatureContent - content of the signature.
        Throws:
        SignatureException - When trying to replace placeholder signature which has already been filled.
        IllegalStateException - When no SignatureFactory is provided to constructor
        IllegalArgumentException - When trying to replace placeholder signature with signature that has non-matching DataHash OR provided SignatureContent does not hold EnvelopeSignature with type of PostponedSignature.
